    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Block
    Immutable record representing a Tetris block shape.
    BlockRenderer
    Helper class for rendering blocks to different containers.
    BlockRenderer.BlockStyle
    Enum for different block rendering styles.
    Board
    Interface representing the game board for a Tetris game.
    BoardDisplayManager
    Manages the display matrix (Rectangle[][]) that represents the game board visually.
    Brick
    Interface representing a Tetris brick (piece) with multiple rotation states.
    BrickGenerator
    Interface for generating Tetris bricks (pieces).
    BrickRotator
     
    ClearRow
    Immutable data class containing information about a row clearing operation.
    ControlsDialog
    Manages the controls dialog for the game.
    DownData
    Data transfer object that encapsulates the result of a down movement event.
    EventSource
    Enumeration of possible sources for game events.
    EventType
    Enumeration of possible game event types.
    FontLoader
    Utility class for loading and managing the custom digital font.
    GameConstants
    Centralized constants for the Tetris game application.
    GameController
     
    GameEffects
    Handles visual effects and animations for the game UI.
    GameOverPanel
     
    GuiController
     
    HighScoreManager
    Utility class for managing high score persistence.
    InputEventListener
     
    InputHandler
    Handles keyboard input for the game.
    Launcher
    Launcher class for the TetrisJFX application.
    LayoutManager
    Handles responsive resizing and layout binding for the game UI.
    LevelManager
    Manages level progression and lines cleared tracking for the Tetris game.
    LevelManager.LevelUpdateResult
    Result object containing level update information.
    Main
    Main JavaFX Application class for TetrisJFX.
    MatrixOperations
     
    MenuController
     
    MoveEvent
    Record representing a move event in the game.
    MusicManager
    Manages background music playback for the Tetris game.
    NextShapeInfo
    Immutable data class containing information about the next rotation state of a piece.
    NotificationPanel
     
    PauseMenuDialog
    Manages the pause menu dialog for the game.
    PhantomManager
    Manages phantom mode functionality.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Implementation of BrickGenerator using the 7-bag randomizer algorithm.
    SceneManager
    Manages scene navigation and stage transitions for the application.
    Score
    Manages the game score using JavaFX properties for reactive UI binding.
    SimpleBoard
    Concrete implementation of the Board interface.
    ViewData
    Immutable data class containing information about the current game view state.
